ygData.subject: RE: Healers other than bard
ygData.msgSnippet: You can t heal the mob in that it helps it - but you can cast on it and waste your mana. Sylly. ... From:	Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) [mailto:kblair@lucent.com]
ygData.messageBody:
You can't heal the mob in that it helps it - but you can cast on it and
waste your mana.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)
[mailto:kblair@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 9:06 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Healers other than bard

From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>

> the druid said true? Or am I
> correct in my assumption that
> the druid was healing the
> monsters?

I believe he was healing the mob, probably by mistake.
Playing a Cleric
before, I know it gets confusing having to select the party
member to heal,
then re-selecting the mob you're fighting. If you're not
agile with your
keyboard, it's easy to mess up.
